_sText:
the vmf file goes here "ion particle cannon": C:program files/steam/steamapps/*you account*/sourcesdk/bin/prefabs/

a test map comes with the download which goes here "fy_ubercannonsb0": C:program files/steam/steamapps/*you account*/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps


1.  shoots red helicopter bombs with left click

2.  shoots 2 people at once with right click

3.  to move the cannon, use W A S D

4.  sometimes you can get stuck in the barrel since the barrel is rotating, the driver of the cannon just needs to move the barrels around for the launched to become loose.
